snippet: Seeking another friendly platform to make light banter and show her softer side, Mrs. Clinton stopped by the “Late Show With Stephen Colbert” on Tuesday night to make her pitch to the middle class, divulge her TV viewing habits and attempt to...
abstract: Seeking another friendly platform to make light banter and show her softer side, Mrs. Clinton stopped by the “Late Show With Stephen Colbert” on Tuesday night to make her pitch to the middle class, divulge her TV viewing habits and attempt to explain some questionable wardrobe choices from her past.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Takes the Cool Seat Next to Stephen Colbert
